summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing the Director of Engineering to execute grant agreements with the Washington State Department of Transportation for Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act funds for design and construction activities on the Bridge Seismic Retrofit Project; authorizing the acceptance and deposit of the grant funds to be received; amending the 1994 Transportation Capital Improvement Program to reflect these grant awards; and authorizing the hiring of consultants and proceeding with construction.
